00076     public: static const int32_t MIN_FRAME_LENGTH = HEADER_LENGTH + TRAILER_LENGTH;

00085     public: static const int32_t MAX_PAYLOAD_LENGTH = MAX_FRAME_LENGTH - HEADER_LENGTH - TRAILER_LENGTH;

00092     public: static const int32_t VRL_FAW = 0x56524C50;

00100     public: static const int32_t NO_CRC = 0x56454E44;

00103     public: static const int8_t VRL_FAW_0 = 0x56;
00105     public: static const int8_t VRL_FAW_1 = 0x52;
00107     public: static const int8_t VRL_FAW_2 = 0x4C;
00109     public: static const int8_t VRL_FAW_3 = 0x50;
00110 
00112     public: static const int8_t NO_CRC_0 = 0x56;
00114     public: static const int8_t NO_CRC_1 = 0x45;
00116     public: static const int8_t NO_CRC_2 = 0x4E;

00296     private: inline static int32_t getPacketEnd (const vector<char> &buffer, int32_t off) {
00297       int32_t max = getFrameLength(buffer, 0) - TRAILER_LENGTH;
00298       if (off <    0) return off;
00299       if (off == max) return NO_MORE_PACKETS;
00300       if (off >  max) return INVALID_FRAME;
00301 
00302       int32_t len = BasicVRTPacket::getPacketLength(buffer, off);
00303       return ((len > max) || (len < 4))? INVALID_PACKET : off+len;
00304     }
00305     private: int32_t getPacketEnd (int32_t index) const;
00306

00371     public: inline int32_t setVRTPackets (int32_t maxFrameLength, const BasicVRTPacket &packet) {
00372       if ((maxFrameLength < MIN_FRAME_LENGTH) || (maxFrameLength > MAX_FRAME_LENGTH)) {
00373         throw VRTException("Illegal max frame length given (%d)", maxFrameLength);
00374       }
00375       return setVRTPackets(true, maxFrameLength, &packet);
00376     }
00377

00390       if ((maxFrameLength < MIN_FRAME_LENGTH) || (maxFrameLength > MAX_FRAME_LENGTH)) {
00391         throw VRTException("Illegal max frame length given (%d)", maxFrameLength);
00392       }
00393       return setVRTPackets(true, maxFrameLength, packet);
00394     }

00482     public: inline int32_t getFrameLength () const {
00483       return getFrameLength(bbuf, 0);
00484     }
00485 
00487     public: inline static int32_t getFrameLength (const vector<char> &buf, int32_t off) {
00488       return getFrameLength(&buf[0], off);
00489     }
00490 
00492     public: inline static int32_t getFrameLength (const void *ptr, int32_t off) {
00493       const char *buf = (const char*)ptr;
00494       return (0x000FFFFF & VRTMath::unpackInt(buf, off+4)) << 2; // <<2 to convert words to octets
00495     }
00496 
00503     public: inline static bool isVRL (const vector<char> &buf, int32_t off) {
00504       return isVRL(&buf[0], off);
00505     }
00506 
00513     public: inline static bool isVRL (const void *ptr, int32_t off) {
00514       const char *buf = (const char*)ptr;
00515       return (buf[ off ] == VRL_FAW_0) && (buf[off+1] == VRL_FAW_1)
00516           && (buf[off+2] == VRL_FAW_2) && (buf[off+3] == VRL_FAW_3);
00517     }
00518 
00530     public: void setFrameLength (int32_t length);
00531

00537     public: void* getFramePointer ();
00538 
00540     public: inline void swap (vector<char> *buffer) {
00541       if (readOnly) throw VRTException("Frame is read-only");
00542       bbuf.swap(*buffer);
00543     }
